body:
On 25 Sep 2008, at 11:59, tarik.rahman at ed.ac.uk wrote:


> Hi
>
> I was wondering if someone knows how to generate a view file in  
> Radiance, given real life
> camera calibration parameters. I've created a scene and view file  
> in Radiance and I'm now trying to create the exact geometric model  
> in real life.


If you have a nice perspective image you could try the 'match photo'  
feature in SketchUp:


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fhzpqf7fywM&feature=related


Only works for smaller values of 'exact', though.


Thomas
___
